ProfessionalProfile.Title: Professional Profile
ProfessionalProfile.Text: Ninth semester student of computer systems engineering, willing to learn something new every day, especially programming. I am a responsible, adaptable, honest, and committed person with great ease to learn and face challenges.

SkillsAndAbilities.Title: Skills & Aptitudes
SkillsAndAbilities.Text: I'm a person who easily handles technology and digital tools, as I can easily understand things. I have knowledge of programming topics such as data structures, graphs, different design patterns, different programming paradigms, dynamic and static programming.

MainDescription.Part1: I'm a FullStack developer. My passion for technology intensified when I discovered programming. I loved the challenge of creating something new from scratch. I felt like a wizard, able to transform my ideas into reality.
MainDescription.Part2: As a FullStack developer, I have the opportunity to work on both sides of web development: the frontend and the backend. This allows me to have a complete view of the development process and create applications that are both functional and attractive.
